description:
An intuitive diagram software with templates for any scenario.

EdrawMax is a powerful, all-in-one, and yet easy-to-use diagramming tool that enables users to visualize the ideas effortlessly. With EdrawMax, you can create and customize flowcharts, Venn diagrams, mind maps, organizational charts, Gantt charts, UML diagrams, electrical drawings, genograms, building plans, etc.
Agent Diagram Types Expanded: Instantly generate ECharts, Scientific Illustrations, Gantt charts, ER diagrams, and more.

Agent AI Templates Upgraded: Added 100+ new AI templates for one-click creation of professional diagrams.

Mermaid Support Added: Insert Mermaid code to generate 10+ diagram types.

Gantt Chart Enhancements: Added 8 new themes.

New Canvas Search Bar: Quickly find features, assets, and help content.

Improved Asset Search: Now supports multi-type simultaneous search.

PowerPoint and Word Add-ins: improved AI-text-to diagram generation and added new diagrams like Technology Roadmap, Architectural Diagram, Gantt Chart, Scientific Illustration, and more.

Various user experience optimizations and bug fixes.
